amendment.description: Amendment sought to allow the President to use the line item veto only when the Federal budget exceeds the target deficit level towards achieving a balanced budget.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the authority of the President to apply a line item veto whenever the amount of the proposed budget deficit falls below specific established guidelines designed to achieve a balanced budget by the year 2002.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tauzin amendment (A018) Failed by voice vote.
